## Looking at the data.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
d <- read_csv('Behavioral_Risk_Factors__Selected_Metropolitan_Area_Risk_Trends__SMART__MMSA_Prevalence_Data__2011_to_Present_.csv')

d %>% as.tibble()
```

How many years and where?

```{r}
unique(d$Year)
unique(d$Locationabbr)
unique(d$Locationdesc)
```
